title: Kogel CNC-machine customizable crankset preload adjuster for DUB & 30mm spindles
content:
Ever wondered why your expensive crankset comes with a flimsy plastic preloader? Perhaps not. But, for those of you that have, it may be because you’ve had the misfortune of discovering it snapped at the location where the hex bolt threads in. Now, you can swap it out for a rather more durable CNC-machined aluminium […]

author: Jessie-May Morgan
